reviewText:
Great photography! Truly amazing! You
just cannot beat that 5.1-surround sound,
and that HD-IMAX picture.
Most of the IMAX-offerings are the best
things to show off your home theater with.
Although I am by no means an adrenaline junkie, I do enjoy living vicariously through videos like Adrenaline Rush. It was really fun to watch and a good way to spend a free afternoon.
